name: Duck Duck Splash
discri: A fun twist on the classic game Duck Duck Goose, where instead of tagging someone the person who is it gently splashes water on the chosen duck The splashed player then becomes it and the game continues. Perfect for keeping cool on hot days while enjoying some lighthearted and active play with friends and family.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
